message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us!
Your turn! I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money.  This offer is only better than waiting one more round.
Come on, let's split the difference, I'm being more than fair considering the inflation!
Time is money, Alice!  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this. Let's not lose any more to inflation.
